verses.verse: For <S%G846>yourselves,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> our <S%G1529>entrance<s%> in to you, that it was not in <S%G2756>vain:<s%>

But <S%G2532>even<s%> after that we had <S%G4310>suffered<s%> <S%G4310>before,<s%> and were <S%G5195>shamefully<s%> <S%G5195>entreated,<s%> as you <S%G1492>know,<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> we were <S%G3955>bold<s%> in our <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G73>contention.<s%>
For our <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> was not of <S%G4106>deceit,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> in <S%G1388>guile:<s%>

But as we were <S%G1381>allowed<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to be <S%G4160>put<s%> in <S%G4100>trust<s%> with the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> we <S%G2980>speak;<s%> not as <S%G700>pleasing<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G2316>God,<s%> which <S%G1381>tries<s%> our <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>

For <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4218>at<s%> <S%G4218>any<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> <S%G1096>used<s%> <S%G1722><s%> we <S%G2850>flattering<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> as you <S%G1492>know,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> a <S%G4392>cloak<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness;<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3144>witness:<s%>

<S%G3777>Nor<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> we <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> of you, <S%G3777>nor<s%> yet of <S%G243>others,<s%> when we <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G1722>burdensome,<s%> <S%G922><s%> as the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
But we were <S%G2261>gentle<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3319><s%> you, even as a <S%G5162>nurse<s%> <S%G2282>cherishes<s%> her <S%G5043>children:<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> being <S%G2442>affectionately<s%> <S%G2442>desirous<s%> of you, we were <S%G2106>willing<s%> to have <S%G3330>imparted<s%> to you, not the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>souls,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> you were <S%G27>dear<s%> to us.

For you <S%G3421>remember,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> our <S%G2873>labor<s%> and <S%G3449>travail:<s%> for <S%G2873>laboring<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G4314>because<s%> we would not be <S%G1912>chargeable<s%> to <S%G5100>any<s%> of you, we <S%G2784>preached<s%> to you the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

You are <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G3743>piously<s%> and <S%G1346>justly<s%> and <S%G274>blamelessly<s%> we <S%G1096>behaved<s%> ourselves among you that <S%G4100>believe:<s%>

As you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> we exhorted and <S%G3888>comforted<s%> and <S%G3143>charged<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you, as a <S%G3962>father<s%> does his <S%G5043>children,<s%>
That you would <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> you to his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> and <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2168>thank<s%> we <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G89>without<s%> <S%G89>ceasing,<s%> <S%G3754>because,<s%> when you <S%G3880>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which you <S%G189>heard<s%> of us, you <S%G1209>received<s%> it not as the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but as it is in <S%G230>truth,<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1754>effectually<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in you that <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

For you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> are in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> for you <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5024>like<s%> things of <S%G2398>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4853>countrymen,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as they have of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and have <S%G1559>persecuted<s%> us; and they <S%G700>please<s%> not <S%G2316>God,<s%> and are <S%G1727>contrary<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men:<s%>

<S%G2967>Forbidding<s%> us to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> that they might be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> to <S%G378>fill<s%> up their <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G104>always:<s%> for the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G5348>come<s%> on them to the <S%G5056>uttermost.<s%>

But we, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> being <S%G642>taken<s%> from you for a <S%G5610>short<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> in <S%G4383>presence,<s%> not in <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G4704>endeavored<s%> the <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> with <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1939>desire.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> we <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, <S%G3303>even<s%> I <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> and <S%G1364>again;<s%> but <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1465>hindered<s%> us.

For <S%G5101>what<s%> is our <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2746>rejoicing?<s%> Are not <S%G2532>even<s%> you in the <S%G1715>presence<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> his <S%G3952>coming?<s%>
For you are our <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5479>joy.<s%>
